Projects Posts Codepens

How'd you get here?

These skills span 10+ years of personal exploration and professional employment. They reflect my ability to seek out, learn, and perform complicated tasks; my ability to adapt to change, and to persevere during difficult stages; and the level of integrity, carefulness, and responsibility that I put into my work. I value informed, quality, research-based data and creative solutions to problems. All of this grew from:

  • 5 years professional experience with JavaScript and advanced Front-End Web Principles
  • 15 years with HTML, CSS, Web Design, Wordpress, Web Hosting, Graphic Design, Fine Arts
  • 6 years in Biodefense Research, with DOD Secret clearance and DOJ Select Agent clearance

Personal Skills and Strengths

  • Highly empathetic, inclusive, team-oriented
  • Value integrity and honesty over politics
  • Can look at complex information and distill key points
  • Creative, artistic, fun-loving

The Ideal Position

I have worked on projects throughout the stack, but Front-End Development and UX Design is my happy place and where my greatest strengths lie. I'm passionate about using Front-End languages and technology to create useful, interesting products that meet user needs.

  • Front-End Development, Full Stack with focus on Front-End, or Front-End/UX Design combination
  • Local to Columbus, OH -or-
  • Support remote employees / distributed offices
  • Direct hire (not contracting)

About You

Chosing companies based on best fit is a luxury that many, particularly women, don't often get. I value this opportunity and am taking my search with care and consideration. The most important things I'm looking for in a company are:

  • Culture

    I'm looking for places that actively foster:

    • Collaboration and Respect - across roles, departments, and job titles
    • Employee Health - including work/life balance and mental health
    • Continued Education - be it through mentoring, attending conferences, paying for classes, hosting groups, etc

  • Mission

    In "job listing" speak: Bonus points if your company:

    • Does good in the world through product or philanthropy
    • Focuses on the Users through active research and feedback loops
    • Makes fairness and transparency company values

Contact Me

As I mentioned, if you think my skills and your needs are a great fit, send me an email! jldennison.contact@gmail.com

No recruiters or contracting positions, please.
